content: Introducing our premium one-layered paper towel, perfect for all your cleaning and wiping needs. Each roll is 20cm wide and 300m long, providing you with plenty of paper to tackle any mess. Each package includes six rolls, so you'll have a steady supply on hand. Our paper towel is absorbent, durable, and easy to use, making it a great addition to any home or office. Don't settle for less, choose our top-of-the-line paper towel for all your cleaning needs.
